name: Magpie (Creative Communications)
description:
Magpie is a creative communications agency with an expertise in good cause campaigns, behaviour change and millennial marketing.
We make it our mission to connect brands and organisations with social influencers and audiences who become the brand advocates of the future.
We use the power of insight and co-creation to challenge current thinking, to unearth new ideas and to develop imaginative creative strategies that inspire, excite and engage.
